title: The Advancing flame
creator_credit: Derek Stewart Productions and British Petroleum
brief_description: Shows a cross section of heavy and light industries where oil fuel is used to advantage in the United Kingdom, Germany, Holland, Sweden and Switzerland. Research and development to achieve higher efficiencies in modern industries investigates drop size distribution, flame radiation, gas flow in boilers, and high intensity combustion, which may well influence plant design and processes in future.
